price: 10. Arrinkani waa sababta waxay horey u geysteen gacmahaagu (oo denbiyo ah),  Allena ma aha dulmiyaha addoomahiisa.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ يَدَاكَ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَيۡسَ بِظَلَّٰمٖ لِّلۡعَبِيدِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bimā qaddamat yadāka wa-anna al-laha laysa biẓallāmin lil'ʿabīdi
